name: Phetrys
description:
A or D to move piece.

Q or E to rotate piece.

SPACE to drop piece.

Numbers on the left display how many blocks are there in each row.

Numbers on the right display at least how many blocks there need to be in that row for the blocks to be cleared.

Credit:
